last_episode_to_air.name: Witch Hunts
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the 1600s, witch-hunters used heinous tactics to unearth heretics practising witchcraft, including the infamous swimming test.

name: Inquisition
overview: This 4 part Mini-Series delves into the causes and horrors surrounding some of history's most horrific persecutions.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A shocking four-part series exploring bloody and menacing persecutions of heresy from history.

episodes.name: Cathars And Templars
episodes.overview: A look at the brutal persecution of the Knights Templars and Cathars.

episodes.name: Spanish Inquisition
episodes.overview: Experts reveal the barbaric torture faced by Muslim and Jewish converts to Catholicism.

episodes.name: Tudor Heretics
episodes.overview: A history of heresy. The founding of the Church of England by Henry VIII and the rule of Catholic monarch Mary I caused years of turmoil as the two faiths ferociously clashed.

episodes.name: Witch Hunts
episodes.overview: In the 1600s, witch-hunters used heinous tactics to unearth heretics practising witchcraft, including the infamous swimming test.
